DOC.brief_title: Study Relationship Between Body Composition , Insulin Resistance HDL Levels
DOC.detailed_description: This study treatment outcome trial.This single center cross sectional analysis body composition lipoprotein level structure among patient grade level renal failure comparison control subject . To study relationship HDL cholesterol body composition insulin resistance measure homeostatic model assessment ( HOMA ) among cohort non diabetic non-proteinuric patient advance chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) compare non diabetic subject normal kidney function . Renal patient choose advanced CKD stage 3 , Stage 4 , stage 5 - end stage renal failure ( ESRD ) hemodialysis . Fasting blood take evaluation baseline lipid renal function , blood glucose level make sure recent evidence diabetes . Body composition measure 2 establish method : DEXA whole body bio-impedance spectroscopy ( BIS ) . DOC.criteria: self report stable body weight past six month ; BMI 1840 kg/m2 ; Hemodialysis dependent least 3 month , prevalent ESRD ( end stage renal disease ) cohort ; GFR > 15 < 44 ml/min ( CKD cohort ) ; GFR > 60 ml/min ( Control cohort ) . Diabetes Mellitus ( American Diabetes Association definition : fasting glucose > 120 mg/dl ) ; Evidence liver disorder , ie ; hepatitis ; thyroid disorder ; HIV medical history ( HIV test perform ) ; Renal transplant recipient ; Oral contraceptive/ hormone replacement therapy ; Systemic use systemic inhaled corticosteroid past month ; Contraindication systemic anticoagulation ( heparin administration necessary measure level LPL , HL ) ; Hemoglobin < 8.5 g/dl ( anemia ) ; Current , within 2 month use hypolipidemic antidiabetic agent ; Patients treat fibric acid derivative niacin past 4 week ; Urinary protein excretion great 0.5 gram per day ; Any condition , opinion investigator , would put subject risk .
